DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to measure the breastfeeding success for all preterm and term newborns in our department of neonatology during the hospital stay and at the age of six months.
DOC.brief_title: Breastfeeding Rates at the Department of Neonatology of University Hospital Cologne
DOC.criteria: Inborn or referred to our Department of Neonatology in the first week of life Informed consent of both parents or legal guardian No informed consent of parent or legal guardian.
